description.text: Comprehensive dream symbolism database for tarot-guided dream analysis and interpretation

quote.text: Dreams are the royal road to the unconscious, and the tarot provides the symbolic language to decode their messages for healing and transformation.

description.text: Conscious dreaming techniques for spiritual development and healing

tarot_reality_check.text: Look at tarot cards in dream - text often changes or appears nonsensical

hand_check.text: Look at hands - often appear distorted or with wrong number of fingers

time_check.text: Check clocks - time often inconsistent in dreams

reading_check.text: Try to read text - often changes when looked at twice
